help_entry.name: branchHeterogeneousGTR
help_entry.succinct: Builds a phylogenetic model assuming branch-specific GTR matrices for nucleotide sequences.
help_entry.verbose: This function builds a phylogenetic model with one GTR matrix per branch. Both exchangeability parameters and stationary frequencies of the GTR matrices are branch-specific. An extra vector specifies base frequencies at the root. The model overall is non-stationary and therefore non-reversible.
help_entry.author: Fredrik Ronquist and Bastien Boussau
